Brand Strategy

A masterclass on building mission-aligned brand strategy for organisations working in emerging technology, space, and sustainable innovation.

What You'll Learn

  • Define your brand purpose
  • Craft a clear value proposition
  • Map competitors and opportunities
  • Develop a messaging architecture
  • Create a visual identity system
  • Build mission-aligned narratives

Workshop Overview

A practical, strategic workshop for building an authentic, differentiated brand.

This workshop equips you with the frameworks and tools needed to create a strong brand identity rooted in mission, values, and clear market positioning. You’ll work through audience insight, messaging systems, visual identity development, and brand rollout planning—designed specifically for organisations operating in innovation-heavy sectors like space, climate tech, and sustainable engineering.

What You Need

A willingness to engage critically with your existing brand, basic familiarity with marketing concepts, and access to your organisation’s mission or product information.

Test

Use this section to test your understanding of brand fundamentals, positioning, and messaging frameworks.
